channel.title: Comments on: השירות הצבאי שלי – חלק שמיני
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: I heard that there are people still looking for electric powder.
item.content:encoded: I heard that there are people still looking for electric powder.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I know we did :) But you know what I always say - you take things far more easily than me.
item.content:encoded:
I know we did :)
But you know what I always say – you take things far more easily than me.

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: I don't agree!!!! WE HAD LOTS OF GOOD TIMES!!!!!!!!!!
item.content:encoded:
I don’t agree!!!!
WE HAD LOTS OF GOOD TIMES!!!!!!!!!!
